Address.value: 1950 SPECTRUM CIRCLE,SUITE 300, MARIETTA, Georgia, 30067, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BlueLinx Holdings Inc is engaged in the distribution of residential and commercial building products. Its business products are split into two categories: structural products and specialty products. BlueLinx's product categories include lumber, panels, engineered wood, siding, millwork, metal building products, and other construction materials. Some of its brands are PrimeLinx, PROLinx, SteelLinx, and BlueLinx Tough Guard. The company's operations are carried out throughout the United States.
